title: Swipe up length (to unlock/go to home screen) is too long. Is there a way to fix this?
content:
When I wake my phone and swipe up to get to the home screen, I have to swipe from the very bottom to 1/2 way up the screen. Very frustrating. This is in contrast to my Pixel 3 which required only a flick of the thumb. 

I don't understand why this is even a feature. What could too short of a false swipe possibly cause other than a potential unlock failure? 

Is there any way to fix this? 

Thank you
